Perceptor:

Perceptor smiled pleased while he heard Reclusa and said with a=
 smile "If you can't find anything that you like for your up grade, I can m=
ake it... "

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 28, 2005 9:40 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Reclusa



  Reclusa::

  She gave him a shocked look. "I beg your pardon=
! I never said that you
  were low ranking or even thought it. I did say th=
at your leader
  wouldn't have sent any less than one of his best bots for =
me. And, by
  your own emmission, you are one of his best. But I am glad to=
 hear
  that your are a widely diversified bot who's skills are most
  inva=
luable. I am glad to see that your not only a great warrior, but a
  scienc=
e bot as well."  She turned and faced the doors. "I am pleased
  that you w=
ere choosen to escort me here. I have every confidence that
  you are the b=
ot to come to should any problems arise."  She turned to
  face him, "I wou=
ld also expect that you are the best bot to talk to
  about a few up-grades=
. Not that I have any deficencies.  But I would
  lke to see any personal w=
eapons upgrades you may have to offer."
